questions.quote: This is an astronaut pen. It writes upside down. They use this in space.
Okay, question #8. What if I told you my fiancee left me for another man? Does that make me more likable, less likable, as likable? Let's start over here this time.
Because. There was a lot of cake lying around the house. Just sitting there going with all the excess milk from all the experiments [grins]
Well, here's your *albums* [Journey "Escape" is on top, BTW...]
Elaine, that's what mail is. Without bills, magazines and junk mail, there is no mail.
You know I thing Kramer might have been responsible for getting Richie involved with drugs in the first place.
"If anybody here knows anything about it I recommend strongly that...you come forward."
Kramer, you can't live down here. This is where people come to die.
Jerry, you're not in show business. You don't know what these people are like.
What the hell do I know about cooking a shirt? What the hell is this? Your paying in pennies?
